feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: Sirius IDE integration with Interpreter view of Acceleo 3. Provides Sirius-specific extensions to the Acceleo Interpreter view. This view is provided through feature org.eclipse.acceleo.ui.interpreter and is independent of the rest of Acceleo. Install this if you want to create Sirius-based modelers and want to easily test your expressions.
